author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Health Department staff of Salem who left for Kumbakonam in connection with Mahamaham festival.— Photo: E. Lakshmi narayanan

Seven medical teams, each comprising 10 medical professional and para-medical staff, left for Kumbakonam in connection with the Mahamaham festival, on Sunday.

The teams were led by Jagadeesh Kumar, Deputy Director of Health Services. Five mobile medical units with basic medical equipment and medicines also formed part of the teams. They will be camping at seven temporary bus stands set up in different parts of Kumbakonam town and provide medical help to the devotees.

The special teams are expected to stay in Kumbakonam town till February 24.
title: Medical teams leave for Kumbakonam
